name: Panco's Journey (itch)
description:
GOAL

Incarnate and help Panco, a white little cat, in his journey to save all Elemalia's residents, trapped in their own home due to a terrible tempest.

Control natural elements and interact with your environment to progress through puzzles.

Use the natural Elements to progess !

Transform up to 3 different unique elements to get through many obstacles, presented in a puzzled way !


Water

Fire

Electricity
Interact with your environment !

Objects are on your way, but can be removed through specific actions you can manage with your elements.

Explore a vast world and their unique specifications !

Unique world where you can visit each race's home to rescue them. Emerge in a unique mood in every biome you can visit.

Take a sneak peak of the world !
